<js>
www="https://m.zongheng.com/h5/category/nav";
css=".cat_list a";
u1="::"; u2="&&";
importClass (org.jsoup.Jsoup);
function get (x,y){
list=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(x)).select(y).toArray().map(a=>a.text()+u1+a.attr("href")).join(u2);return list}
result=get(www,css).replace(/\/h5\/.+?\?/g,"/h5/ajax/category/details?pageSize=10&pageNum=searchPage&");
"æœˆç¥¨æ¦œ::/h5/ajax/rank?pageNum=searchPage&pageSize=10&rankType=1&&ç”·ç”Ÿçƒ­é—¨::/h5/ajax/rank?pageNum=searchPage&pageSize=10&rankType=4&&å¥³ç”Ÿçƒ­é—¨::/h5/ajax/rank?pageNum=searchPage&pageSize=10&rankType=19&&"+result
</js>

<js>
//æ³¨ï¼šè‡ªå®šä¹‰ d çš„å€¼ï¼š1æ˜¯â€œç®€å•â€å‘ç°ï¼›2æ˜¯â€œè¯¦ç»†â€å‘ç°ã€‚ä¿®æ”¹åï¼Œåˆ·æ–°å‘ç°ç¼“å­˜ç”Ÿæ•ˆã€‚
d = 1 ;
www="https://wap.faloo.com/category.aspx";
u1="::"; u2="&&";
importClass (org.jsoup.Jsoup);
function get (x,y){
list=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(x)).select(y).toArray().map(a=>a.text()+u1+a.attr("href")).join(u2);return list};
switch (d){
case 1: css="div.dh+div.cat_box a[href~=\.html]";
result=get(www,css).replace(/(\/[01]){4}/g,"/0/0").replace(/\/(\d+)\/(\d)/g,"/$1/0/$2/searchPage");break;
case 2: css="div.cat_box+div.cat_box ul.cat_list a";
result=get(www,css).replace(/(?=\.html)/g,"/searchPage");break;}
</js>

ruleSearchList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result.replace(/^[^\{]+|\);$|[\r\n]/g,""));
data.results.map(x => {
	let p = x.titleNoFormatting.split(/-|â€“/);
	return {
		a: p[0],
		b: p[1],
		c: p[2],
		d: "æ²¡æœ‰æœ€æ–°ç« èŠ‚ä¿¡æ¯",
		e: x.contentNoFormatting,
		f: x.url+'?locale=zh-CN'
	}
});
</js>
